info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 12:31AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Andrews, eastern Gaines, western Borden, northwestern Martin and Dawson Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1230 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lamesa, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lamesa, Ackerly, Lamesa Municipal Airport, Welch, Los Ybanez, Loop, Sparenberg, Punkin Center, Patricia, Arvana, Hancock, McKenzie Lake, Tenmile, Key and Klondike. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
